person.persName: Thomas W. Robertson (Captain in the 6th Kentucky Infantry; Recruiting in Henry County, Kentucky; Farmer)

body.p: A Kentucky farmer. Lived in Henry County, Kentucky. Served as a first lieutenant in the 6th Kentucky Infantry (Co. K) from December 24, 1861 to December 22, 1862. Assigned to the recruiting service in Henry County. Promoted to captain and served from December 22, 1862 to May 13, 1864. Modified on March 14, 1865 to honorable discharge effective February 7, 1863 due to physical disability.
